summary: This is an email forwarding a Touhy request letter from attorney Christian Everdell to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS). The letter is a formal request for testimony or documents from a federal employee, related to ongoing legal proceedings in the Epstein case.

persons.name: Christian Everdell
persons.context: Attorney from Cohen & Gresser LLP who is sending a Touhy request letter to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, seeking to facilitate the request.

persons.context: Copied on the email regarding the Touhy request, suggesting involvement in the legal proceedings.

events.title: Touhy Request Letter Sent
events.description: Christian Everdell sends a Touhy request letter to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, following up on a previous phone call.

keyFacts: A Touhy request letter was sent by attorney Christian Everdell to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York on August 30, 2021.
The request is related to ongoing legal proceedings in the Epstein case, seeking testimony or documents from a federal employee.
The email indicates coordination between attorneys Christian Everdell, Jeff Pa, and Laura Menninger regarding this legal matter.
